name: Overthinker
description:
Imagine when you are having a conversation with a human being and you are trying to please everyone with the right answer. In the end you are the one having anxiety because of the constant fear of disappointing people with your reply and the worst thing it did happen. That's what Alex our main protagonist have to go through everyday. 

Today the player will follow one of his day and help him make it through the day
